DOC.brief_summary: The aim study collect data Korean patient borderline ovarian tumor .
DOC.brief_title: KOrean Borderline Ovarian Tumor ( KOBOT ) Registry
DOC.detailed_description: The researcher retrospectively collect data Korean patient borderline ovarian tumor ( BOTs ) diagnose , treat , follow November 1994 February 2015 institution place Republic Korea . And researcher prospectively collect data Korean patient BOTs institution place Republic Korea since March , 2015 . If patient agree participate KOBOT registry , patient 's data ( age , body mass index , preoperative finding , laboratory finding , radiologic finding , operative finding , pathologic finding , postoperative finding ) collect research database . The research database update , every 6 month , include data patient 's disease outcome follow-up care . Although data collect form medical record , patient may agin contacted researcher collection data medical record .
DOC.criteria: Patients borderline ovarian tumor ( BOTs ) diagnose , treat , follow November 1994 February 2015 institution place Republic Korea . All patient undergo gynecologic surgery BOTs institution place Republic Korea since March , 2015 Patients receive primary treatment followup least 6 month institution exclude analysis
